segments.text: Good coming , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good coming . I would like to open a new account . I want to deposit 500 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good , sir . What kind would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me how many kinds there are in your bank ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Besides the checking account , there's a monthly savings account and a daily interest account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I think I'd like to take the monthly savings account then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you fill out this form ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . And here's your deposit book .
segments.speaker: S1
